Package test

Class Main

java.lang.Object
test.Main
public class Main extends Object
This class will is the main program and consist of two major methods we enable them as we need We need to start with extractBasmalahFromImagesToList as it will detect the basmalah from each page to a list and we modify this function getSurahBasmalahByPageId Secondly, we can now detect the ayahs
Author:
pc-fahad

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      This is the main method to run each method as we see needed

    • extractBasmalahFromImagesToList

      private static void extractBasmalahFromImagesToList()
      This function will extract the basmalah from each page

    • printSurahBasmalah

      public static void printSurahBasmalah(String correctList, int page, int count, int surahCounter)
      This function will print the location Y and X for the basmalah from extractBasmalahFromImagesToList
      Parameters:
      correctList - correctList basmalah in string format
      page - the page that has the basmalah
      count - the number of basmalah found on this page
      surahCounter - will have the surah counter we count from 1 for the first Surah we detect the Surah as we go.

    • extractQuranAyahFromImage

      public static void extractQuranAyahFromImage()
      This function will extract all the ayah from each page of the Quran, we loop through the images and try to detect using the 21 templates we declared on templateCounter and add all the detections at once and than we remove duplicates.

    • compareArrays2

      public static ArrayList<String> compareArrays2(ArrayList<String> data)
      This function will compare each element inside the array to check if any pixel element is very close to the other. doing this we can remove duplicate pixels detected from different templates as templates will detect the same ayah but with different y,x values so we should try to find if y and x have a similar pixel by 10 pixels close +10 or -10
      Parameters:
      data - the list before error correction
      Returns:
      The list after error correction by removing very close pixels or null if an error occurs

    • readingAyahCount

      private static HashMap<String,String> readingAyahCount()
      Since we already have a list to compare ayah detection we have it stored in temp.txt this file will contain each page and the ayahs in that page for comparison sake
      Returns:
      the list to compare to

    • removeDuplicate

      public static ArrayList<String> removeDuplicate(String rowData)
      This function will just remove duplicates elements so we don't have duplicates in our list
      Parameters:
      rowData - list before duplicates detection
      Returns:
      list after removing duplicate element

    • removeClosePixels

      public static ArrayList<String> removeClosePixels(ArrayList<String> values)
      Actually we have two methods that try to remove very close pixels and use this function first to try and remove very close pixels and if that didn't work we use another function @compareArrays2 to try and detect very close pixels again for the last chance.
      Parameters:
      values - list of detected ayah
      Returns:
      list after correction

    • callTemplateViaNumber

      public static String callTemplateViaNumber(int number, String filename, int i, boolean printImage)
      Since we will loop through the template we need this function to execute the detection by giving it the template number
      Parameters:
      number - Template number to try and use
      filename - The image file that we target
      i - The current image
      printImage - Boolean to print the image after detection to see the result
      Returns:
      The detected values as string from this template

    • listToString

      public static String listToString(ArrayList<String> data)
      This helpful function will convert a list to a string to easier print the values
      Parameters:
      data - list to convert to string
      Returns:
      String value from list

    • run

      public static String run(String inFile, String templateFile, String outFile, int match_method, boolean printImage, double threshold)
      This function will start the detection process from openCV
      Parameters:
      inFile - Image File to target
      templateFile - Template File as use for detection
      outFile - ExtractedFile name after detection
      match_method - Method we use for detection
      printImage - Boolean to state if we need to print the detection image result
      threshold - The threshold
      Returns:
      The values we have detected using this template as string
